titles.title: A bill to provide that the United States District Court for the Judicial District of New Jersey shall be held at Jersey City, New Jersey, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Provides that the U.S. District Court for the District of New Jersey shall be held in Jersey City, New Jersey, in addition to those places currently provided by law.
